About this site

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(rjson)
library(reactable)

references_dir <- "../references/"

fls <- references_dir |> list.files(full.names = TRUE, pattern = "json") 

references_dt <- list()

for(i in seq_along(fls)) {

    json_data <- fls[i] |>
        readLines() |>
        paste(collapse = "") |>
        fromJSON()

    references_dt[[i]] <- json_data

}

references_dt <- references_dt |> rbindlist(idcol = "id", use.names = TRUE, fill = TRUE)

reactable(references_dt)
```
